definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to set out/to set in motion/the start (of some activity)
stage/degree (to which a situation has evolved)/situation/leeway

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的电荷转移是反应的速度控制步。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他给老婆买精致的瓷器，星期天下午带她散很长的步。

sentences.english: But he did, and the dam broke.
sentences.chinese: 但他让了步，大坝决堤了。

sentences.english: Backtracking line search is carried out when the trust region trail step fails.
sentences.chinese: 当信赖域试探步失败时我们进行回溯线搜索。

sentences.english: The adult must help children debug "KUPAO" when they use it for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 大人必须帮助孩子在第一次使用前调试好酷步。

sentences.english: The park is within (easy) walking distance of my house.
sentences.chinese: 公园离我家只有步之遥。

sentences.english: Sliding door variation and then a same foot lunge.
sentences.chinese: 滑门变化步，接着来一个同足剑步下腰。

sentences.english: You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces on you for an interview.
sentences.chinese: 正散着步，有电视台的记者要采访你。

sentences.english: Today I saw a chart of a 12-step Employee Life Cycle.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我看到了一个关于职业生涯周期12步的图表。

sentences.english: An obvious next step is to do away with it, explaining precisely why it should be discontinued.
sentences.chinese: 显然下步就是清除，解释为什么要组织其继续。

sentences.english: Shadowstep now awards one combo point.
sentences.chinese: 暗影步现在奖励一个连击点数。

sentences.english: On days when your basics are good, you will feel good dancing.
sentences.chinese: 当你基本步走好的那一天，你跳舞时感觉会非常好。

sentences.english: I appear to have bartered over the buffer zone and haggled the soldier down.
sentences.chinese: 看来我对缓冲区的讨价还价成功了，士兵终于让了步。

sentences.english: I was drunker than I ought to be by midnight, so I said I was going for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 我酒醉得比往日厉害，因此说自己打算出去散会儿步。

sentences.english: Methods It is a procedure of multi-step processing.
sentences.chinese: 方法该方法是一个多步处理过程。

sentences.english: Ten-thousand steps. Sixteen-hundred calories. Eight hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 十万步，1600卡路里，每天八小时。

definition: to step out/to take a (first) step
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to catch up with/to keep pace with
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
